Summary: southeast direction huming like electrical transformer pulsating above rain clouds larger than several football fields stayed moved northwest towards bradley airport ct. i had to wake up wife drove in vechile in direction going towards rt. 44 east gone .
divs: Sighting Detailsabove the clouds large pulsating light white not storm every second or less try to film battery not charged on video camera but took still shots wife witnessed and huming moved from rt. 44 manchester ct. to bradley airport windsor locks ct. didn.t know who to tell but heard of mufon new england strange humming electrical sound. typing fast sorry it was larger than 3-4 footballf fields and above rain clouds. humming went over taylor street manch. ct. there are work crews on 84 highway and state police to fix roads maybe more reports who noknows please post in joural inquirer if more calls or witnesses this is our town news paper in manch, ct. thanks like your shows on t.v. i believe but have not seen structure yet ... some day i think 2012 will be big year for all kinds of things...
